name: TriNet Group, Inc.
description: TriNet Group, Inc. is a leading provider of cloud-based human resources (HR) solutions for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). Founded in 1988 and headquartered in Dublin, California, TriNet offers a comprehensive suite of HR services, including payroll processing, employee benefits, risk mitigation, and compliance support. By leveraging technology and industry expertise, TriNet enables SMBs to focus on their core business operations while ensuring they meet all necessary labor regulations and standards. The company’s platform integrates various HR functions, simplifying processes for employers and enhancing the employee experience. TriNet serves a diverse range of industries, including technology, healthcare, financial services, and hospitality. The company is dedicated to providing tailored solutions that meet the unique needs of each client, helping them manage their workforce effectively. TriNet's mission is to empower businesses to thrive by delivering exceptional service and innovative HR solutions. In recent years, TriNet has also focused on enhancing its digital offerings, utilizing analytics and automation to improve HR services further. This commitment to technology and service excellence positions TriNet as a trusted partner for companies looking to optimize their HR function.

seo.meta_title: TriNet Group, Inc. | Cloud-Based HR Solutions for SMBs
seo.meta_description: Explore TriNet Group, Inc., a leading provider of cloud-based HR solutions tailored for small and medium-sized businesses. Learn about our comprehensive HR services and technology-driven approach.

faq.answer: TriNet provides cloud-based HR solutions, including payroll processing, employee benefits, risk mitigation, and compliance support.

faq.answer: Burton M. Goldfield is the CEO of TriNet Group, Inc.

faq.answer: TriNet is headquartered in Dublin, California, USA.

faq.question: What industries does TriNet serve?
faq.answer: TriNet serves various industries, including technology, healthcare, financial services, and hospitality.
